title: Sum with Streams
description:
Given a list of numbers [1, 2, 3, 4, 5], use streams to calculate and print the sum.

Expected output: 15
instructions: Given a list of numbers [1, 2, 3, 4, 5], use streams to calculate and print the sum.

hints.text: Use .mapToInt() to convert to IntStream which has a .sum() method
Integer::intValue extracts the int value from Integer objects

commonMistakes.mistake: Trying to call .sum() on a regular Stream
commonMistakes.correction: Convert to IntStream first with mapToInt()
